coref: At a great meeting of the Animals, who had gathered to elect a new ruler, the Monkey was asked to dance. This he did so well, with a thousand funny capers and grimaces, that the Animals were carried entirely off the Animals feet with enthusiasm, and then and there, elected he the Animals king. The Fox did not vote for the Monkey and was much disgusted with the Animals for electing so unworthy a ruler. One day The Fox found a trap with a bit of meat in a trap. Hurrying to the Monkey, The Fox told the Monkey The Fox had found a rich treasure, which The Fox had not touched because it belonged by right to The Fox majesty the Monkey. the Monkey followed The Fox to a trap. As soon as The Fox saw the meat The Fox grasped eagerly for it, only to find The Fox held fast in a trap. The Fox The Fox stood off and laughed. You pretend to be their king, The Fox said, and cannot even take care of The Fox! Shortly after that, another election among the Animals was held.
